item.title: About me
item.author: vvelikodny@gmail.com (Vitaly Velikodnyi)
item.description: I’m Vitaly Velikodnyi (RU: Виталий Великодный), a Senior Software Engineer and Junior Software Blogger, CDN Core Developer at G-Core Labs. Experienced designing and developing Golang based software applications & micro-services, likewise tests & DevOps.
